Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Relates to prohibiting the delay of the availability of e-books to public libraries in the state
Summary: Prohibits the delay of the availability of e-books to public libraries in the state.
LawCode: Add ยง148, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the delay of the availability of e-books to public libraries in the state
